text: It is funny that men who are supposed to be scientific cannot get themselves to realise the basic principle of physics, that action and reaction are equal and opposite, that when you persecute people you always rouse them to be strong and stronger.
author: Gertrude Stein

text: Bachelors have consciences, married men have wives.
author: Samuel Johnson

text: Books are not men and yet they stay alive.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

text: Men of ill judgment ignore the good that lies within their hands, till they have lost it.
author: Sophocles

text: We cannot live only for ourselves. A thousand fibers connect us with our fellow men.
author: Herman Melville
